data.title: Oh Yeah, we got hooked!
data.text: Walked over here for a late night snack!  One night led to another that led to going every night thereafter! We varied our orders each night as there were all kinds of options and the ice cream was more like gelato than regular ice cream!

data.title: Doesn't get any better
data.text: Delicious Chocolate ice cream with chocolate fudge, brown and sprinkles. I will come back again in the future.

data.title: Got happily plump during our vacation! Yum.
data.text: Try coffee and snickers. Or the peanut butter pig-out! Candy bar chunks and giant scoops of ice cream are an essential part of every vacation, right!

data.title: yum!
data.text: Much better than the yogurt shop by the hotel. Staff were friendly and the ice cream delicious.   Worth the short walk.

data.title: Always worth a visit
data.text: When we are in the states, we always make a stop at one of these. Love the choice, love the flavours.

data.title: great ice-cream
data.text: I have been here many times, it's very close to the beach. after a day in the sun it's a wonderful treat. plus it's so nice to pick and choose your own type of ice cream not just what the manufacturer provides.

data.title: Ice Creal
data.text: EXCELLENT Ice cream and not too expensive. Lots of choices to choose from with mixing items. VERY GOOD

data.title: Grab a great ice cream treat here!
data.text: Cool kids serving up cool treats at a cool location in the center of this great little beach town of Carlsbad

data.title: Yummy ice cream treat!
data.text: Ice cream was excellent.  Service was great.  There was a line of people out the door but the staff seemed to keep things moving at a good clip.  Would go back again.

data.title: Great location chill ice
data.text: Good, overpriced ice cream. A typical tourist stop, same as any everywhere. We have one in Tucson. Linda's, on the South side of Carlsbad Village Drive is much better for less. Unlike many local places not very dog-friendly.

data.title: Good ice cream!
data.text: We enjoyed a late night ice cream.  They were packed but the employees worked hard and had good customer service.

data.title: perfect for vacation
data.text: nice to have a yummy ice cream shop in our vacation spot; our kids loved having the shop near our hotel and beach

data.title: Owners of this Coldstones need to wake up and fire the staff!
data.text: Ice cream shops come and go.  Once the novelty wears off, location, product quality, and service keep you in business.  If this Coldstone was in a location that required repeat customers to stay in business, they would be closed!   We went on the night of May 9th.  The two guys working, had one customer finishing up.  They then ignored us- not even a 'hello' or even eye contact for several minutes, until another group of people came in.  Then one begrudgingly waited on us, while the other continued to ignore the group behind us.  We told the clerk the order would be 'To-Go', yet each time he completed his mix, we had to ask for a lid, each time he smeared ice cream all over the outside of the container when he added the lid yet did not wipe it off and did not give us a bag until we asked  (4 bowls of ice cream carried by 1 person- no bag???).  The whole time, no smiles, no please, no thank you, but some serious stink eye.   Coldstones' Ice cream is usually mixed on the cold part of the stone so it refreezes, but this takes a little muscle to mix, crabby guy was not about to do that, so he mixed where the last customer's order had been mixed, on the warmest part of the slab, so the ice cream was borderline milkshake by the time it went into the bowl.)  At every opportunity to be pleasant or do his job, he had to be asked to do the minimum.  Owners beware, you are loosing your repeat business with these guys, you may not have to close, but I bet your revenues are way down this year!  We are locals, and you can bet we won't be back.

data.title: Friendly
data.text: Cold Stone is pretty much Cold Stone no matter where you get it.  The difference here is that even though the staff was slammed, they were both very friendly and fast.

data.title: Excellent!
data.text: My husband got a half chocolate/half cookie dough ice cream and I was allowed a couple bites. OMG it was soooo good. I wish I had been in town longer so I could have ordered one of my own!

data.title: Birthday Cake Remix
data.text: Love this place! Service was quick. Ice cream and toppings were mixed to perfection, with a very generous serving.

data.title: Ice cream
data.text: This was by far the best ..SUNDAY..I have had in years. Pick and watch them create...really cool.  Sure kids would be thrilled.  Very good service and accommodating. They would split one size intwo...excellant

data.title: Cold Stone Creamery, Carlsbad
data.text: Good service, ice cream was a bit soft, but it was a hot day.  Cold Stone is always very good...located right on Carlsbad Blvd., right across from the village.

data.title: After dinner snack
data.text: Yummy dessert for everyone. Able to order just what you want. Good service and everyone gets what they want.

data.title: exellent
data.text:
Good and fast service.
The kids were enthusiastically eager to please and of course the most wonderful produce ever blended on a cold flat plate.
